description.value: The commander makes three melee or two ranged attacks
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+6]] (+6) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 ([[/r 1d8 + 3]]) slashing damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+6]] (+6) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 ([[/r 1d10 + 3]]) slashing damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+6]] (+6) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 ([[/r 1d6 + 3]]) piercing damage.
Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+6]] (+6) to hit, reach 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 ([[/r 1d6 + 3]]) piercing damage.

items.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long rest)

description.value: For 1 minute, the commander can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the commander. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership. die at a time. This effect ends if the commander is @condition[incapacitated].

Once per turn, the martial commander can deal an extra 10 (3d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the martial commander that isn't @condition[incapacitated].
The commander adds +2 AC against a melee attack that would normally hit it. To do so, the commander must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Whether through demonic blessing, celestial bequeathment, crazed experiment, or skillful craft, this weapon has been enhanced to bring more bloodshed by the bearer.

You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

description.value: A lengthy stright blade designed for slashing foes, the longsword is a highly versatile weapon that may also be wielded with two hands for more punishing strikes.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

description.value: A complete costume usually used by performers and artists in all manner of entertainment halls or for those that simply refuse to get out of character.
